== Picn*x 20 ==

* Date: Saturday August 27, 2011
* Time: 11AM - 4PM
* Location: <nowiki>[[http://www.sunnyvale.ca.gov/Departments/CommunityServices/Parks/BaylandsPark.aspx|Sunnyvale Baylands Park]]</nowiki>
* Picnic Registration (required to attend): http://www.linuxpicnic.org/guests/rsvp.pl
* Blog post by Elizabeth Krumbach: <nowiki>[[http://princessleia.com/journal/?p=4949|Ubuntu California at Picn*x 20 and Android cookies]]</nowiki>
* Photo set: <nowiki>[[http://www.flickr.com/photos/ubuntu-us-ca/sets/72157627534061734/]]</nowiki>
